name: PlanetProtect
description:
🌝Protect Planet — a game about protecting the planet!🌝

😿What's new in 0.0001alpha?✊

🕊2 New Skins!🦏

🧗time mode🌰

🐝Save the planet from asteroids🐛

🌬Buy spaceships to protect the planet🐆

🤹‍♂️You have new enemies...👾

🤺Fight bosses🎲

📜And if you're not sorry, write a comment and give me a penny💸

P S: this is only the alpha version and most of the above is not yet in the game((
